name: Speculum (Zaaxos)
description:
Speculum is a little horror game where the player will have to stay aware of what's behind them in order to not get caught. Indeed, the cursed monster will hunt and haunt them forever during the whole game, but, this monster can only be seen through a mirror since it is invisible to the player's eyes. 

The player must find the exit in order to get a point and keep roaming in this maze again and again to get the highest score possible. However, beware of the monster that will begin to be more and more aggressive and relentless as the player gets more points.

This game was made by Lucas JOURDAN and Julien CASCALES.

Controls:

  • WASD : Move
  • A/E : Rotate the mirror to the left/right
